## Titel einfügen 
```{R}
# Creating a copy of tweets
tweets_orig <- tweets

# Calculating average lenght of tweet
char_counts <- nchar(tweets$Tweet)
av_char_count <- mean(char_counts)
rounded_avg_char_count <- round(av_char_count, 2)
print(rounded_avg_char_count)
```
